title: Rapidus announces new artificial intelligence design tools
description: The chipmaker, which already uses artificial intelligence in certain aspects of its business, expects its integration to enable it to cut design time and cost.
content:
Rapidus, Japan’s government-backed semiconductor developer, is betting on artificial intelligence-enhanced design tools to give it an edge over its competitors, in an effort to speed up its chip-design process and minimize costs.

title: Elon Musk shifts AGI timeline again, now says xAI may reach it by 2026
description: Tech billionaire Elon Musk has reportedly changed the timeline for xAI to reach artificial general intelligence (AGI). Now, Musk believes that his company’s AI models may surpass human intelligence by next year.
content: Elon Musk is seen as one of the leading figures in the world of artificial intelligence (AI). He started xAI in 2023. Since then, the firm has made rapid advancements with AI, but the goal of artificial general intelligence (AGI) - a state where AI c... [1949 chars]

title: Environmental Groups Urge Congress to Ban Data Centers
description: Environmental and democrat groups are lining up to oppose the artificial intelligence revolution, a technological advancement on the scale of the internet. The end result will be a victory for AI and common sense, and the failure of renewable energy and the ideology of Climatism, the fear of human-caused global warming.
content:
By Steve Goreham
Originally published in MasterResource.
Environmental groups seek to halt data center construction in the United States. They warn that data centers consume enormous quantities of electricity and water and contribute to climate chang... [5549 chars]

title: Saudi Arabia wants to host the world’s cheapest data centres
description: Saudi Arabia’s plan for all this cheap electricity is to power enormous data centres for artificial intelligence (AI). | World News
content: The cost of inference, the process of querying and getting answers from an AI system, is made up of two things—the fixed cost of computer hardware, and the ongoing cost of the electricity to run it. Cutting corners on hardware is a false economy, sin... [4544 chars]

title: India's AI Revolution: Unlocking $500 Billion Economic Potential in MSMEs
description: Adopting artificial intelligence in India's 64 million MSMEs could unlock over $500 billion in economic value. A recent report highlights the need for India to shift from an 'adopt-first' to an 'invent-first' mindset, focusing on deep innovation and value creation, amidst challenges like digital infrastructure and talent access.
content:
A recent report indicates that the integration of artificial intelligence (AI) into India's 64 million micro, small, and medium enterprises (MSMEs) could potentially generate over $500 billion in economic value.

description: KUALA LUMPUR: I-Bhd has announced the opening of the AI World Experience Centre at i-City Sales Gallery, touted as a large-scale immersive showcase of artificial intelligence and humanoid robotics.
content:

title: Sensex, Nifty Open Lower Amid Global Sell-Off; Nifty IT Jumps 1% Despite US Tech Rout
description: Indian equity markets began Thursday’s session on a subdued note, mirroring steep overnight declines on Wall Street as investors pared exposure to richly valued technology and artificial intelligence (AI) stocks. The US markets extended their losing streak overnight, mainly due to profit booking in technology and AI-related stocks, which had earlier seen sharp rallies.

title: RRP Semiconductor Share Price: THIS Indian AI Stock Has Surged 55,000%
description: The world’s best-performing stock is turning into a cautionary tale for investors chasing outsized returns from the artificial-intelligence boom. Little-known until recently even within its home market of India, RRP Semiconductor Ltd. became a social-media obsession as its shares surged more than 55,000% in the 20 months through Dec. 17 — by far the biggest gain worldwide among companies with a market value above $1 billion.
content:

title: Indian share market opens lower amid global sell-off, but Nifty IT surge 1 % despite US tech selling
description: Domestic stock markets opened on a cautious note on Thursday, tracking sharp overnight losses in the US markets, as investors booked profits in high-valuation technology and artificial intelligence (AI) stocks.
content:
